alert.note: Alert for Codington; Day; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:57PM MDT until August 10 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... Northern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bitter Lake to near Florence to Medicine Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Watertown around 705 PM CDT. Rauville and Dakota Sioux Casino around 710 PM CDT. South Shore around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Waverly, Marvin, Stockholm, Twin Brooks, Troy, Strandburg, Milbank and La Bolt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
